title: Conversions to Tags Translation
goal: Practice translating between conversion style and tag style.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Quick recall:

te dunda → recipient first
se dunda → gift first
fi ... fa ... cu dunda fe ... → tagged

New Material (5-7 min)

Converting Between Systems

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
xagji x1 is hungry for x2 hungry
taske x1 is thirsty for x2 thirsty

Conversion → Tags

Any converted sentence can be rewritten with tags:

se dunda → tags:

Conversion Tags
la cukta se dunda mi la .bob. fe la cukta fa mi cu dunda fi la .bob.

Both mean: The book is given by me to Bob.

te dunda → tags:

Conversion Tags
la .bob. te dunda la cukta mi fi la .bob. fa mi cu dunda fe la cukta

Both mean: Bob receives a book from me.

ve vecnu → tags:

Conversion Tags
mu no ve vecnu la cukta do mi fo mu no fa mi cu vecnu fe la cukta fi do

Both mean: 50 is the price of the book to you from me.

Tags → Conversion

Going the other direction:

Tags Conversion
fe la cukta fa mi cu dunda fi la .bob. la cukta se dunda mi la .bob.
fi la .bob. fa mi cu dunda fe la cukta la .bob. te dunda la cukta mi

When Each Is Better

Situation Better choice
Common derived verb Conversion (se pilno, te dunda)
Complex reordering Tags
Clarity for beginners Tags
Brevity Conversion

Key Point

Conversions and tags are interchangeable. Master both to read any Lojban text.

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Conversion → Tags

Rewrite using tags instead of conversions:

  1. la cukta se viska mi → ?
  2. la .bob. te dunda la skami la .alis. → ?
  3. pa no no ve vecnu la karce do mi → ?
Answers
  1. fe la cukta fa mi cu viska
  2. fi la .bob. fa la .alis. cu dunda fe la skami
  3. fo pa no no fa mi cu vecnu fe la karce fi do

Exercise 2: Tags → Conversion

Rewrite using conversion instead of tags:

  1. fe la plise fa mi cu nelci → ?
  2. fi la .alis. fa la .bob. cu benji fe la notci → ?
  3. fe la karce fa do cu ponse → ?
Answers
  1. la plise se nelci mi
  2. la .alis. te benji la notci la .bob.
  3. la karce se ponse do

Exercise 3: Use New Vocabulary

Translate:

  1. I am hungry.
  2. Bob is thirsty.
  3. I am hungry for apples.
Answers
  1. mi xagji
  2. la .bob. cu taske
  3. mi xagji la plise

`fi la .bob. fa la .alis. cu dunda fe la skami`

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Express the same idea both ways:

"The book is given by me to Alice."

  1. Conversion: → la cukta se dunda mi la .alis.
  2. Tags: → fe la cukta fa mi cu dunda fi la .alis.

Say both aloud.

Today's Vocab

Lojban Place Structure English
xagji x1 is hungry for x2 hungry
taske x1 is thirsty for x2 thirsty

Summary

You practiced translating between conversions and tags. Both systems achieve the same reordering — choose based on clarity and brevity.
